data.title: Shahid: Latest News, News Articles, Photos, Videos
data.meta_description: Find Latest News, Videos and Pictures about Shahid. Explore latest updates, news, information from NewsBytes. All about Shahid.
data.text:
20 Jun 2023

Apurva Asrani

Apurva Asrani to quit Twitter; apologizes to netizens

Filmmaker Apurva Asrani took to Twitter to announce that he will be quitting the microblogging site soon. Asrani is a National Award-winning editor who is also a director and screenwriter. He is known for being vocal and opinionated on social media.

11 Jan 2021

Bollywood

Shahid Kapoor seeks 'fun' roles after wife Mira's rant

After delivering some critically-acclaimed performances, Shahid Kapoor is now looking to play easy roles. Wondering why?

05 Oct 2020

Netflix

Shahid Kapoor takes Rs. 8 crore pay cut for 'Jersey'

Shahid Kapoor is setting an example for fellow stars as he has reportedly decided to take a massive Rs. 8 crore cut in his salary for the upcoming movie Jersey.

01 Oct 2020

Dalit

After Hathras, another Dalit woman gang-raped in Uttar Pradesh, dies

Just as the atrocities meted on the 19-year-old Dalit woman in Hathras shocked India, another rape was reported from the same state â€” Uttar Pradesh.

11 Dec 2019

Bollywood

Denied Best Actor award, Shahid Kapoor walks out of show

In a shocking turn of events, Bollywood heartthrob Shahid Kapoor recently walked out of a popular award show function, after he was denied the Best Actor award.

29 Aug 2019

Yuvraj Singh

Shahid, Mira to move into their Rs. 56cr-worth house, soon

Shahid Kapoor and Mira Rajput, who recently celebrated their daughter Misha's third birthday, are all set to move into their dream house soon.

Why did Mira Rajput miss Shahid's 'Kabir Singh' success bash?

Shahid has every reason to be happy these days as Kabir Singh continues to slay the box office.

Hindustan Times

Shahid Kapoor waxed! Unveils his statue at Madame Tussauds, Singapore

Last July, Bollywood actor Shahid Kapoor had said on Instagram that his wax statue at Madame Tussauds, Singapore, is being made.

Shahid Kapoor

Shahid Kapoor smoked nearly 20 cigarettes daily for 'Kabir Singh'

Just three days back, teaser of Shahid Kapoor's Kabir Singh was released, and we are still in awe.

Love like Rawal loved Padmavati: Shahid tells Deepika's husband Ranveer

Shahid Kapoor is a doting husband and has raised the bar for all men around.

10 Aug 2018

Shahid Kapoor

#BattiGulMeterChaluTrailer: Shahid Kapoor is the one to watch out for

The trailer of 'Batti Gul Meter Chalu' has Shahid Kapoor written all over it, and one can be sure to see an amazing character graph of this actor in the movie.

24 Jul 2018

Bollywood

Shahid Kapoor to get his wax statue at Madame Tussauds

A lot of Bollywood stars have been featured at Madame Tussauds museum. Now, the next in line to be waxed is Shahid Kapoor.

23 Apr 2018

Sanjay Leela Bhansali

Shahid dedicates his Dadasaheb Phalke Excellence award to wife Mira

Shahid Kapoor, who was presented with the Dadasaheb Phalke Excellence award (Best Actor) for his portrayal of a Rajput king named Maharawal Ratan Singh in Sanjay Leela Bhansali's 'Padmaavat', has dedicated the award to his beloved wife Mira Rajput Kapoor.

03 Mar 2018

Hollywood

Hollywood movies which were copied from Bollywood!

Inspired, plagiarized, official remake, unofficial remake - these are some of the words that are used when a Bollywood movie plot closely mimics that of a Hollywood production.

28 Feb 2018

Bengaluru

Bengaluru: Fingers chopped off as revenge for protesting nuisance

We have always been taught never to tolerate any nuisance, but what if it results in loss of a body part? Will it be worth it then?
